column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The staff were kind
column2: Â but disorganized. After minutes someone brought a pizza to our table which was not ours. We told the server and he seemed irritated at us. When our pizza finally came out
column3: it was wrong because of server gave our pizza to another table. They quickly made us a personal size of what we were supposed to get on half of ours. No compensation or apology was offered for the numerous mistakes. Good pizza
